**Cleaning Services at the High Commission of Canada**

#### **Request for Proposal**

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01026637

The High Commission of Canada in Trinidad and Tobago is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of cleaning services. The High Commission occupies a floor of the Maple House building on Sweet Briar Road. The space includes a main reception area, an immigration waiting room, a multi-purpose room, a conference room, kitchenettes, washrooms and showers. The total floor area is 3,324m2.

The services required will be performed over a period of approximately 2 years (2023-05-01 to 2025-04-30).

The Specification includes:

* Sweeping, mopping, dusting and vacuuming floors and surfaces
* Cleaning of all washrooms and kitchenettes
* Disinfection and sanitizing of high-touch areas
* Emptying of trash and recyclables
* Supply of cleaning materials (but not civil works)

The provision of cleaning services will be evaluated on the basis of price and the ability of the supplier to deliver the services. This contract is scheduled to commence on May 1, 2023.

Suppliers must be able to demonstrate their ability to meet the deadline for services required on an ongoing daily/ weekly schedule.

Proposal submissions must be made electronically through [contact email] by the closing date of March 23, 2023 at 2:00 p.m. Preference will be given to Canadian suppliers; bidding suppliers must commit to execute the contract according to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Eligibility Requirements:**

* Bidders must be resident in Canada and who qualify under Trade Agreements including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Suppliers will be expected to adhere to all applicable laws and regulations in Trinidad and Tobago and its territory
* All bidding suppliers must also commit to execute the contract according to CETA.

The contract amount will be determined by the invoices rendered throughout the contract period and shall not exceed $600k in its estimated max value.
